backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining data models, form validation logic, storage mixins, access control state, and form/user management maps.
DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing how to deploy the application to the Internet Computer with separate public and admin URLs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing a frontend fix related to admin-page actor initialization and referencing affected components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing UI components, hooks, styling, and behavior across the app.
frontend/env.json: Environment configuration file with deployment instructions for IC mainnet and local development, including canister ID placeholders.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root element and global layout for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling route detection, admin authentication flow, and conditional rendering of public form or admin dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AddressAutocompl: Address autocomplete component integrating Mapy.cz and Nominatim APIs with suggestion dropdown and validation error styling.
frontend/src/components/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login UI using Internet Identity with optional stay-signed-in checkbox and cancel action to return to the form.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with copyright text, a heart icon, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FormList.tsx: Displays a list of insurance forms with actions for viewing, deleting, exporting to CSV, and marking forms as viewed.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows a fixed header with branding, a car image, and an optional envelope button for form management.
frontend/src/components/InsuranceFormCom: Implements a large, stateful insurance form with validation, submission handling, and many input sections.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
Modal for collecting sender name and email before final form submission, with validation and submit/cancel controls.
frontend/src/components/VehicleAutocompl: Provides brand and model autocomplete inputs using local datasets with suggestion logic and UI handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, login flow, and providing context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for creating, fetching, deleting, and marking forms, integrating with actor calls and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables, themes, and animations for global styling including light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, constraints, known issues, and required fixes related to admin form submission.
unknown.txt: Documentation describing admin features, deployment steps, production setup, and system behavior.
